## hpr0848 :: Alan Cocks, the info point project

 
In todays show Ken talks to Alan Cocks about the info point project setup by Jono Bacon. It is an outreach program to get the message of open source to visitors at and how he has spread the open source message at the Bracknell Computer Fair  each month https://www.britishcomputerfairs.com/cgi-bin/floorplan?vnu_id=5


https://infopointproject.org/wordpress/
Editor's Note: The above site is no longer available. The link refers to the last copy made on the Wayback Machine
From HPR @ OggCamp11
